citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30am on 16-FEB-
22. The inspector spoke to a household member who stated the licensee was not at home.
End Section
